text: Ana vahe'mo'za rankege nehu'za, havige zamireku zamavufaga ra nehu'za, vahera zamazeri oti ke hu'za monko zamavuzmava nehu'za, maka zamagra zamavufarera monko zamavuzmava nehaze. Zamagra monko zamavuzmavamofo zamesizana notre'za, e'inahu zamavuzmava nehu'za zamentintimo hanave oti'nea vahera zamami'mi hu'za zamavazu nehaze.
